def is_remote_control_existence():
    # Determine if the remote control exists in the environment
    symbol remote_exists = exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote)
    return remote_exists

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if is_remote_control_existence():
            # If the remote control exists in the environment, bind and observe its details
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)
        else:
            # If the remote control is not found, initiate search by observing relevant items
            foreach item: item:
                if not visited(item):
                    observe(item, "Check if this is the remote control")

def has_switch(remote_control: item):
    symbol has_switch = exists switch: item : is_remote_control(remote_control) and close(remote_con
trol, switch)
    return has_switch

def is_television(television: item):
    symbol is_tv = exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and close(tv, television)
    return is_tv

behavior turn_on_with_remote(remote_control: item, television: item):
    body:
        assert has_switch(remote_control)
        assert is_television(television)
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        achieve is_on(television)

behavior __goal__():

        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control] == 2052
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television)
        turn_on_with_remote(remote_control, television)
